name: Chickens on the Freeway by Vitoco
name_original: Chickens on the Freeway by Vitoco
description:
Chickens on the Freeway

(c) 2022 by Victor Parada

Chickens must go to the

other side of the freeway.

Who will help more of them?

Game written for NOMAM's

BASIC 10-liners Contest 2022.

Requires:

- Atari XL/XE (or emulator)

- FastBasic 4.5.2 IDE

- 2 Joysticks

Game instructions:

- Guide the chicken to the

  other side of the Freeway.

- Use the joystick to move

  up or down, avoiding the

  cars.

- You score each time a

  chicken arrives to the top.

- The game lasts only two

  minutes and few seconds.

- The winner is the player

  with the higher score.

https://www.vitoco.cl/atari/10liner/
